definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Much dreaming and many words are meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 多梦和多言，其中多有虚幻。

sentences.english: Know, which dare at cardinal mom does the in front talk more half sentence?
sentences.chinese: 知道，哪个敢在主母面前多言半句？

sentences.english: Talkative and inattentive in class, should try to work harder.
sentences.chinese: 上课多言散漫，应用功学习。

sentences.english: This is obvious; of course no need to say further.
sentences.chinese: 这一点是显而易见的，自然毋须多言。

sentences.english: There are three applicable wordless actions that I have found to be of greatest use.
sentences.chinese: 我发现有三种可用而无需多言的最有效的方法。

sentences.english: One honest voice can be louder than a crow.
sentences.chinese: 一个诚实的声音胜过众口多言。

sentences.english: So, needless to say, I occasionally have days where I’m stressed out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 那么，无需多言，我偶尔也感觉精神压力很大。

sentences.english: The main effect that children house grows to the child is beardless already and wordy.
sentences.chinese: 儿童房对于孩子成长的重要影响已无须多言。

sentences.english: The noisy parrot sleeps in its cage.
sentences.chinese: 多言的鹦鹉在笼里睡着了。

sentences.english: Don't interrupt, let them talk and use silent pauses to encourage them to talk.
sentences.chinese: 不要打岔，在停顿时用沉默鼓励让他们多言。

sentences.english: Not to talk much, nor of myself.
sentences.chinese: 不可多言，不要老谈自己。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the president should not let himself be bullied.
sentences.chinese: 无需多言，总统不应受到此类“救市危言”的干扰。

sentences.english: In the multitude of words there shall not want sin: but he that refraineth his lips is most wise.
sentences.chinese: 多言难免无过，明智的人必约束自己的唇舌。

definition: talkative/to speak out of turn/to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/rumors fly
to retire/to withdraw/to retreat/to step down
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
